attributes.action: stop foriegn people claiming our benefits and taking our jobs
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
we want to stop forignen people from coming to our country to claim our benefits and steal our jobs. 
our country is in crisis and british citizens are being turned away from benefits and foriegn people get them straight away.
Pretty soon we will be outnumbered in our own country, british children being bullied by forigen children adults attacked.
Are we going to have to change our name to engstan!
stand up for you rights and enforce australian style border control!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
